Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an instance of WordLibrary and generates random words from it. The category the user chooses in the game is compared to the category belonging to the word, and whether the user's choice is correct or not is returned. If the user's choice is correct, the score is updated.
    Version:
    11/3/18 Written for HackHolyoke 2018
    Author:
    BluePuddleCat
